Changelog
=========

2.13.2 (2010-07-09)
-------------------

- Actually establish Zope 2.12 compatibility by dealing with all cases of
  moved classes and functions.

2.13.1 (2010-07-09)
-------------------

- Made compatible with Zope 2.12.9.

2.13.0 (2010-07-09)
-------------------

- Released as separate package.
